ComicInfo.Summary: Shauna picks up a box of cakes to deliver to a client, but one of them turns out to be a sentient being, Dera the Drambette. Her sister, Moyra, switches it with a cake that she had, and Shauna makes the delivery without any sentient beings in the box. Moyra's boyfriend, Ghenghis Boggs, mistakes Dera for a doughnut and eats them, much to Moyra's horror.
